divs: Sighting DetailsMy mother and I were on our way to the market on 7-02-12 in the city of Ontario Cal. We go to parking lot and started to park when my mother noticed the lights that look like they were hovering above the store. We got out and were later joined by other people. There is no way this could b a hoax, the ligts were at a distance but were so clear and moving at a very fast spe it was on Vineyard ave.ed. Changing formation randomly. The colors were amazing!! Never seen anything like it! It was onVineyard and 4th st.!
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
